Who: Tuscon
Location: Area just outside the location of the Black fortress =
(Matrix Quest)

> He then closes his eyes, to delve deeper into the power o=
f the Matrix which he holds within him.
>
> " Primus, give me the strength =
to take back what has been wrongfully taken from us. A power which Cyclonus=
 had no right to steal. A power that is earned and not taken. He has betray=
ed you Primus, he has betrayed the one commandment that all Autobot kind ha=
s abided by for centuries. I am here to redeem what has been wrongfully sto=
len from Rodimus Prime. Please, grant me the power to accomplish my plight.=
"

From somewhere inside his head Tuscon can hear voices, several voices
sp=
eaking although their words are indistinct at first and then they
slowly be=
come clearer.

"Yong Tuscon" said a voice that sounded disturbingly like Op=
timus,
"Why do you seek light from darkness, when the light is already with=
in
you?"

A more shrill voice spoke, his words quick and to the point, "The=

wisdom of the matrix cannot be truly taken by force, only given."

A much =
older voice could then be heard, "You are the spark that can
reignite the f=
ire. But to do that you must cleanse the dark fire that
already burns with =
the bearer of the Matrix."

(TAG)

Preston
